participant_1.background:
I like to go to YouTube to watch funny videos with my nephews.
My most prized possession is my running shoes because they have helped me to stay healthy and active throughout the years.
I don't have any social media presence because my time is focused on my music.
I listen to Bruno Mars' music and reminisce about the good times I had playing sports with my family and friends when I was younger.
i hate to lose.

participant_2.background:
I'm interested in learning more about how to cope with my wife's terminal cancer.
I sometimes spend hours practicing bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it.
I love spending time with my dog on Christmas.
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
i vacation in florida every winter.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you doing today?
Not bad, thank you. I'm trying to learn more about how to cope with my wife's terminal cancer.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I can't imagine what you must be going through. I'm here if you need to talk.
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate it.
What are some of your hobbies?
I love spending time with my dog on Christmas. I also like to practice bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not very good at bird calls either, but I still enjoy trying them.
It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I agree. What are some of your favorite Bruno Mars songs?
I love all of his songs, but my favorites are "Finesse", "24k Magic", and "Uptown Funk".
Those are all great songs! I love "Finesse" and "24k Magic".
Yeah, they are. I'm glad you're enjoying your time in Florida. It sounds like you're having a great vacation.
